mapper.delete: delete ${centre}.pmk_file where pmk04 <= sysdate AND pmk18 !='X'and pmk01 not in (select distinct pml01 from ${centre}.pml_file)
mapper.select:
select pmk01,pmk02,pmk04,pmk12,gen02,pmk13,gem02,pmk18,pmk25,#{centre} centre,smydesc from ${centre}.pmk_file left join ${centre}.smy_file on smyslip = SUBSTR(pmk01,0,4) left join ${centre}.gen_file on gen01 = pmk12 left join ${centre}.gem_file on gem01 = pmk13
and lower(pmk01) like lower('%${code}%')
